traits.name: Giant
traits.description: You tower over others of your kind, your exceptional size granting you raw power but making you an easier target to hit.

traits.name: Small
traits.description: Your diminutive frame allows you to slip through tight spaces and dodge with ease, though your reach and physical presence suffer for it.

traits.name: Limp
traits.description: An old injury left you with a permanent limp that slows your stride and makes prolonged physical exertion painful.

traits.name: Scarred
traits.description: Your body is a tapestry of battle scars and old wounds—each one a story of survival that hardened your mind but marked you forever.

traits.name: Missing Eye
traits.description: The empty socket where your eye once was serves as a constant reminder of your loss, making depth perception a daily challenge.

traits.name: Missing Hand
traits.description: You've learned to adapt to life with one hand, but two-handed tasks and delicate work remain frustratingly difficult.

traits.name: Blind
traits.description: Darkness is your constant companion, forcing you to rely on sound, touch, and intuition to navigate a world you cannot see.

traits.name: Deaf
traits.description: You exist in perpetual silence, your eyes becoming sharper to compensate for what your ears cannot hear.

traits.name: Muscular
traits.description: Years of training or natural gifts have sculpted your body into a powerful instrument, every movement radiating strength.

traits.name: Gaunt
traits.description: Your skeletal frame makes you appear frail and sickly, though hunger has taught you to move quietly and endure hardship.

traits.name: Albino
traits.description: Your pale skin and colorless hair mark you as different wherever you go, your light-sensitive eyes struggling in bright conditions but commanding attention in any crowd.

traits.name: Heterochromia
traits.description: Your mismatched eyes—each a different color—make you unforgettable to anyone who meets your gaze.

traits.name: Chronic Pain
traits.description: Pain is your constant companion, draining your mental reserves but teaching you to push through suffering that would break lesser souls.

traits.name: Quick Reflexes
traits.description: Your body responds to danger before your mind even registers it, muscles twitching into action with lightning speed.

traits.name: Slow
traits.description: Whether from injury, build, or simply poor coordination, you lumber along while others rush past.

traits.name: Ambidextrous
traits.description: Both hands work with equal grace and precision, giving you an edge in tasks that leave others fumbling.

traits.name: Frail
traits.description: Your body seems made of glass—delicate, fragile, and prone to breaking under stresses others shrug off.

traits.name: Hardy
traits.description: You possess an iron constitution that shrugs off illness and injury, your body bouncing back from punishment that would hospitalize others.

traits.name: Mute
traits.description: Silence is your only voice, forcing you to communicate through gestures and expressions while relying on stealth and nimble fingers.

traits.name: Disfigured
traits.description: Burns, scars, or birth defects have left your appearance twisted and unsettling, though pain has made you perceptive to the suffering of others.

traits.name: Short
traits.description: You stand well below average height, making you harder to spot but easier to overlook in a crowd.

traits.name: Tall
traits.description: You tower over most people you meet, your height granting you presence and reach but making concealment difficult.

traits.name: One Eyed
traits.description: You lost one eye but kept the other, learning to compensate for the loss of depth perception through hard-earned experience.

traits.name: Healthy
traits.description: Vitality flows through you like a spring river—you rarely fall ill and wounds heal faster than they have any right to.

traits.name: Unhealthy
traits.description: Your body is a battlefield of ailments and weaknesses, sickness clinging to you like a shadow you can't escape.

traits.name: Loud
traits.description: Your voice booms like thunder even when you try to whisper, making stealth an exercise in futility.

traits.name: Quiet
traits.description: You speak in hushed tones that others strain to hear, but your soft footsteps make you a natural at going unnoticed.

traits.name: Sickly
traits.description: Illness finds you like a moth to flame—every plague, every fever seems drawn to your weakened constitution.

traits.name: Strong
traits.description: Raw strength courses through your muscles, making feats of power that challenge others feel effortless to you.

traits.name: Dumb Brute
traits.description: You're built like an ox and about as clever—your massive frame and brute strength compensate for your lack of wit and charm.

traits.name: Runt
traits.description: You're the smallest and weakest of your family, a fact that's been hammered into you through years of being overshadowed.

traits.name: Wimp
traits.description: You've always been the target of bullies and intimidation, your meek demeanor inviting abuse but also teaching you when to run.

traits.name: Tough as Nails
traits.description: Pain washes over you like water off stone—you've weathered so much that one more bruise hardly matters.

traits.name: Attractive
traits.description: You turn heads wherever you go, your natural beauty opening doors and winning favor with minimal effort.

traits.name: Unattractive
traits.description: Your features are harsh and uninviting, making social interactions awkward as people avert their eyes.

traits.name: Eagle Eyes
traits.description: Your vision is extraordinarily sharp, allowing you to pick out details at distances that leave others squinting.

traits.name: Physically Fit
traits.description: Your body is a well-oiled machine, muscles toned and endurance seemingly limitless from disciplined training.

traits.name: Ginger
traits.description: Your fiery red hair and freckled complexion mark you as distinctive, for better or worse depending on local superstitions.

traits.name: Hairy
traits.description: Thick body hair covers you like a pelt, making you distinctly memorable and occasionally uncomfortable in social settings.

traits.name: Balding
traits.description: Your hair has been in steady retreat for years now, leaving you with a receding hairline that makes you look older than you are.

traits.name: Masculine
traits.description: You carry yourself with rugged, traditionally masculine traits—broad shoulders, strong jaw, and commanding presence.

traits.name: Feminine
traits.description: Your features and mannerisms lean toward the traditionally feminine—graceful, delicate, and disarming.

traits.name: Hunch Back
traits.description: Your spine curves unnaturally, forcing you into a permanent stoop that makes movement painful and speed difficult.

traits.name: Tremors
traits.description: Your hands shake constantly with involuntary tremors, making fine motor control a frustrating challenge.

traits.name: Allergies
traits.description: Pollen, dust, and various substances send you into sneezing fits and watery-eyed misery, especially outdoors.

traits.name: Thick
traits.description: You're built wide and solid—stocky rather than tall—giving you stability but making quick movements awkward.

traits.name: Pale
traits.description: Your skin is ghostly white, lacking any color or vitality and suggesting underlying weakness to those who see you.

traits.name: Maimed
traits.description: A brutal old wound left permanent damage—the kind that aches on cold days and never fully heals.

traits.name: Bent Nose
traits.description: Your nose has been broken and healed crooked, giving your face a rough, brawler's character.

traits.name: Fast
traits.description: You move with exceptional speed, your legs carrying you across ground faster than anyone has a right to travel.

traits.name: Weak Stomach
traits.description: Your stomach turns at the slightest provocation—gore, bad food, rough travel all leave you retching and miserable.

traits.name: Steady Feet
traits.description: Your balance is exceptional, making you nearly impossible to knock down or trip even on treacherous ground.

traits.name: Talks Fast
traits.description: Words tumble from your mouth in a rapid-fire stream that often leaves listeners struggling to keep up.

traits.name: Always Hot
traits.description: Your body runs like a furnace, making you sweat in comfortable weather and suffer in heat while thriving in cold.

traits.name: Always Cold
traits.description: You shiver even in warm weather, your body seemingly unable to generate enough heat no matter how many layers you wear.

traits.name: Decrepit
traits.description: Age, injury, or illness has left you a withered husk, your body barely functional and threatening to fail at any moment.

traits.name: Beautiful
traits.description: You possess striking beauty that captivates those around you, your appearance opening doors and turning heads effortlessly.

traits.name: One Legged
traits.description: You've learned to move with a peg leg or crutch, but running and complex movements remain severely compromised.

traits.name: One Armed
traits.description: You've adapted to life with a single arm, though tasks requiring two hands remain frustratingly out of reach.

traits.name: Arthritic
traits.description: Your joints ache with inflammation and stiffness, making every movement a reminder of your body's deterioration.
